tags.notes: Solabia Group is a leading French supplier of microbiome-friendly cosmetic ingredients. Their flagship prebiotic BioEcolia® is an α-glucan oligosaccharide produced through patented enzymatic biocatalysis from natural sugars (sucrose and maltose). Also offers ECOSKIN, a pre/probiotic complex spray-dried on maltodextrin containing α-glucooligosaccharides (GOS). Products support microbiome protection and promote skin radiance through selective feeding of beneficial bacteria.

Solabia's BioEcolia® is a patented α-glucan oligosaccharide produced through enzymatic biocatalysis from natural sugars (sucrose and maltose). Available in powder form. ECOSKIN is a pre/probiotic complex spray-dried on maltodextrin. Focus on microbiome protection and radiance promotion. Distributed by Trulux in some regions.

Solabia Group is a leading French cosmetic ingredients manufacturer specializing in microbiome-friendly prebiotics. Their flagship product BioEcolia® is an α-glucan oligosaccharide prebiotic produced through patented enzymatic biocatalysis from natural sugars (sucrose and maltose). BioEcolia® selectively feeds beneficial skin bacteria, promoting microbiome balance, skin radiance, and protection. ECOSKIN is a pre/probiotic complex spray-dried on maltodextrin containing α-glucooligosaccharides (GOS) for comprehensive microbiome support. Available through distributors like Trulux in the US. Strong scientific backing with clinical studies demonstrating efficacy in microbiome protection and skin health improvement.

Solabia's BioEcolia® is an α-glucan oligosaccharide produced through patented enzymatic biocatalysis from vegetal substrates (sucrose and maltose). Available in powder form. ECOSKIN is a related pre/probiotic complex spray dried on maltodextrin containing α-glucooligosaccharides (GOS). Major French cosmetic ingredient supplier with focus on microbiome protection and radiance promotion. Listed on UL Prospector.
